description:
For years of shop use, this wrench are made of heavy-duty, heat-treated steel.

  • One side is a single hook, the other is a hook spanner with 3 notches
  • Hook end fits 3-notch lockrings with a maximum outside diameter of 46mm, and minor diameter (in the notches) of 40mm
  • Ddesigned for bottom bracket lockrings
name: Park Tool HCW-5 Crank and Bottom Bracket Wrench
